name: PDBViz

screenshots.caption: Successful attempt at loading a PDB file into Maya

short_description: This is an open source Protien Data Bank (*.pdb) file format importer plug-in for Autodesk's Maya Unlimited/Complete Animation and Special Effects software. The plug-in is being created to facilitate dissemination of scientific research.
